title: Add formater in CI
body:
Given that has many contributors with different styling preferences, CI should ensure a more cohesive style.

**Examples**

From https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3205 use of single or double quotes in YAML

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/e8ce723abc5014b810a5b30c4e14aa6eebdad043/configs/mainnet.yaml#L3-L4

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/84fcfa8b2fda2452ccd1e18d94f12f9bb526ab7c/configs/mainnet.yaml#L3-L4

From `specs/_features/sharding/beacon-chain.md`. Spaced out container declaration vs non spaced out. Field comments on same line vs on previous line 

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/84fcfa8b2fda2452ccd1e18d94f12f9bb526ab7c/specs/_features/sharding/beacon-chain.md?plain=1#L119-L127

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/84fcfa8b2fda2452ccd1e18d94f12f9bb526ab7c/specs/_features/sharding/beacon-chain.md?plain=1#L143-L145

https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/84fcfa8b2fda2452ccd1e18d94f12f9bb526ab7c/specs/_features/sharding/beacon-chain.md?plain=1#L151-L155

While pedantic, this is common in most languages default tooling and exist in most implementation codebases
